name: Dhaba Bhuna Gosht Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Dhaba Bhuna Gosht Recipe: Meat Â½ kg Tomatoes 1-1/2 grams Ginger 1 tsp Garlic 1 tsp All spices powder 1 tsp Green coriander 2 tbsp Red chilli 1-1/2 tsp Salt to taste Onions 2 Green chilli 6 Turmeric 1 pinch
instructions: Heat oil and fry onions now add ginger ,garlic and meat and roast Then add salt red chili powder and turmeric mix and cook till than tender .meat around tender Then add chopped tomato and roast well When oil come on surface then leave on dum Finally add all spice powder ,fresh coriander and green chilli slices and serve.
